article_title: Vidant Health proposes regional hub at Onslow Memorial

article_metadata.description: Greenville-based Vidant Health rallied for support in Onslow County this week, when the nine-hospital group aired plans to transform Onslow Memorial Hospital into its first regional hub.
article_metadata.author: Michael Todd -  Michael.Todd@JDNews.com

og.description: Greenville-based Vidant Health rallied for support in Onslow County this week, when the nine-hospital group aired plans to transform Onslow Memorial
